changelog.change: Fixed the final QTE split for THE END during the main story
Added Another Story functionality. Auto-starts upon the first loading screen after sonic enters the portal, adjust your splits accordingly.
Fixed the Cyberspace IGT to match the in-game value during Cyberspace Challenges.
Fixed the autosplitter to function on Frontiers Update 3.
Fixed issue where autosplitter would not start upon entering Cyberspace Challenge modes other than Kronos Island.
Fixed issue where the autosplitter would split twice upon starting a NG+ run.
Fixed support for the additional Music Memories added with Sonic Frontiers v1.30
Fixed IGT calculation on Cyber Space levels for Sonic Frontiers v1.30
Moved Skills Unlocks to the "Misc" page.
Added the option to split on collecting any Music Memory.
Fixed autosplitting logic when exiting the fishing level on Ares.
Improved IGT logic in cyberspace levels.
Fixed small oversight in v1.3.0 that involved boss rush.
Added support for Boss Rush and Cyberstage Challenge.
Added the options to split upon unlocking any skill from the skill tree.
Fixed default setting for progressing from Kronos to Ares (default is now true).
Fixed multiple unwanted autosplitting when exiting the game through Alt-F4.
Reverted previous commit because apparently it broke the autosplitter.
Added a lot of new splitting options.
Partial rewrite of the memory logic (improves performance).
Due to how the new splitting logic works, previously-set custom splitting options might have been reset. PLEASE check settings.
Fixed: the setting added in the previous version was accidentally and wrongly left enalbed by default.
Code optimization
Added a setting to prevent the game from automatically pausing if the user switches to another window (disabled by default)
Fixed final split being triggered even when failing the QTE
Uninteresting update (changed some internal logic, mostly for performance stuff)
Added autosplitting when exiting fishing levels (check settings)
Permanently removed auto-reset from the setting
Fixed a memory leak issue
Other improvements under the hood
Disabled auto-reset as it conflicts with the recently-found pinball skip
Improved general coding under the hood
Improved splitting conditions in story mode
Fixed autosplitter not starting in arcade mode
First public release
